title: Key fragments
body: i cant get key fragment or boxes idk why...:/ riot pls fix it

replies.body:
If you've recently been under a restriction or suspension by the Instant Feedback System, it will take a reform period before you're eligible to earn hextech materials again. There isn't a set time for when you'll earn eligibility again and there are a lot of factors involved, so I recommend reading through our [**Hextech Crafting Restrictions**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209939463) article for more info on how this works.

Let me know if you have any questions.
